reviewText: I always wanted to visit Khajuraho in India because they have these fascinating buildings covered with statues performing sexual acts out of the Kama Sutra. This movie plays mostly in Khajuraho and the story is about a Californian sculptor who comes to work in Khajuraho to restore some statues. He is accompanied by his girl friend and they have sexual problems. They run into a beautiful Indian woman who turns out to have been the sculptors' lover in another life. I like the part when the movie tells the story of the lovers in the past. The modern day love story in between the sculptor and his girlfriend is a little bit cheesy and looks like it came out of a soft-porn studio. this is my second DVD I bought with the title Kama Sutra, the other one is a film made by the famous Indian director Mira Nair, which is better.
summary: Strange movie playing in Khajuraho, India
Title: N/A

reviewText: "Tales from the Kama Sutra."It's not the highest budget film, but all the India scenery looks so good, and the naked Indian women. So if they would release this in High Definition Blu-Ray, I'm sure that it would re-sale this movie to those of us who discovered this scarcely recognized release.
summary: Not exactly a wonderful script, but still, wonderful eye candy.
